articles.title: Scientists Discover New “Primitive Cousins of T. Rex” – Finding Sheds Light on the End of the Age of Dinosaurs in Africa - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Scientists in Morocco have uncovered fossils of primitive cousins of T. rex that had short, bulldog snouts and even shorter arms have been discovered by scientists in Morocco. These two newly identified dinosaur species are members of the Abelisauridae family…
articles.content:
ByUniversity of BathAugust 27, 2023
Scientists discovered fossils of two new dinosaur species in Morocco, revealing that diverse carnivorous species lived there just before the asteroid-induced exti… [+5480 chars]
